## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G12900](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G12900)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>S8H</u>
- **Gene Name:** Scopoletin 8- Hydroxylase
- **Description:**   2-oxoglutarate (2OG) and Fe(II)-dependent oxygenase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090359
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
